summary: CES Talent Management Associate with experience designing company-wide onboarding, orientation and mentoring programs. Team-oriented Training and Development Coordinator who efficiently develops training processes and procedures for human resources teams.

experience.title: Project Coordinator Associate
experience.description: Coordinate Installation Quality Audit reports; track IQA results; streamline 9-box review processes; plan and logistics for conferences and trainings; support learning of new technologies (Cummins Connect and Outlook 365); assist new hires with CCW environment, PO's, Ariba, travel, scheduling; maintain databases and communicate project updates; train staff during demonstrations, meetings, conferences and workshops.

experience.title: Talent Management HR Associate
experience.description: Facilitated CES site OnBoarding modules; prepared training modules and logistics; led process improvement updating Aftertreatment 101; supported onboarding within first 90 days (80% attendance); organized CES Intern Events; evaluated training program effectiveness and recommended improvements; conducted orientation sessions and on-the-job training; coordinated ongoing technical and personal development classes; developed surveys; created training manuals and materials; delivered courses on communication, team building, and related topics; trained instructors; planned corporate events; communicated objectives and schedules to management.

experience.title: Assistant Property Manager
experience.description: Assisted in the management of a 152-unit apartment community.

experience.title: Substitute Teacher
experience.description: Basic classroom instruction and management; used Project Based Learning (PBL) techniques to connect classroom learning with real-world applications.

experience.title: Arts and Education Program Manager
experience.description: Developed, planned and implemented summer and after-school programs for over 200 youth ages 5-18; key responsibilities included program planning and execution.

experience.title: Classroom Teacher
experience.description: Instruction; provided classroom education and student support.
